From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Well since nobody seems to want a piece of him

Bounty checks his chrono scope. the six hours were up. He took flight based
on the only reply to his threat. He opened a comm to the Predacon base where
Darkmouse had transmitted from, "This is Bounty you will lower the shields
and weapons and issue an immediate surrender of all your forces. He
transformed to his robotic turkey mode, switched on a temporal travel device
and warped to the base. Out of sync with time it would be nearly impossible
for autoguns to lock onto him.
----- Original Message -----
From: THECODE <thecode@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, November 23, 2000 12:00 PM
Subject: Re: A holiday tradition


> OOC: Burning Hammer could probably cut Bounty's head off with his hand,
but
> right now he's doing more important things, sorry...
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <cyberwolf4@...>
> To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> Sent: Thursday, November 23, 2000 10:19 AM
> Subject: Re: A holiday tradition
>
>
> > No need to apoligize Logo, if you insult a character with another
> > character it's between them, not us. I don't take anything directed
> > at my characters as personal but I'm not going to have my turkey
> > carved by a mouse, lets get some worthy opponents in on this.
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > > (Sorry about that. DarkMouse never was one to have that much
> > respect
> > > for authority. LMAO)
> > >
> > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > > > Bounty checked his translator, either it was malfunctioning or
> > he'd
> > > > just been insulted. "Insulting an officer of the law? punishable
> > by
> > > > death." He had his first target located, they now had 5 hours and
> > > 50
> > > > minutes to respond to his direct order.
> > > >
> > > > (I'll wait and see if anyone else gets in on the slaughter before
> > > > posting with him again.)
> > > >
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > > > > DarkMouse::
> > > > >
> > > > > She heard the transmission. She sighed and opened her link. She
> > > was
> > > > > getting bored and had nothing better to do. She listened and
> > > > > laughed. "Get a load of this guy. He thinks he can actually go
> > > > around
> > > > > and make us surrender just by threats?" She laughed. "Oh I got
> > to
> > > > > reply to this one."  She turned on her link, but sent the
> > signal
> > > > > through the atmosphere to block it's origins. She then replied
> > to
> > > > > this bot. She stuck out her tongue at her
> > link,"FFFBBBBRRRRTTTTT"
> > > > > Then disconnected the transmission. She fell on the floor
> > > laughing.
> > > > >
> > > > >
> > > > >
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > > > > > Bounty opened a channel on all frequencies, "I am a security
> > > > > officer
> > > > > > of the temporal sciences law enforcement agency. All beings
> > not
> > > > of
> > > > > > this world are ordered to report to my ship to
> > unconditionally
> > > > > > surrender or Be hunted down like the animals you transform
> > > into,
> > > > > You
> > > > > > have six hours to comply or I will do this the hard way. He
> > > > paused
> > > > > > hoping for a quick response, "I do hope you prefer the hard
> > > way."
> > > > > he
> > > > > > landed by his ship and waited for the flocks of bots to
> > return
> > > > and
> > > > > > surrender.
